subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Aksel Lund Svindal, the overall World Cup leader, mastered the fresh snow conditions on the Stelvio course in Bormio, Italy, on Sunday to win a downhill for his fourth victory of the season.
snippet: Aksel Lund Svindal, the overall World Cup leader, mastered the fresh snow conditions on the Stelvio course in Bormio, Italy, on Sunday to win a downhill for his fourth victory of the season.
